item.title: Dav add a quote by Ian McDonald
item.description: "He's never fought with religion; what is the point of railing against such beauty, such intimate theatre, such chime of eternity? He can treasure it without believing in it." -- Ian McDonald

item.title: Dav add a quote by Ian McDonald
item.description: "Legends should stay legends otherwise they just become history, when the natural course of things is the other way around, from history to legend." -- Ian McDonald

item.title: Dav add a quote by Jun'ichirō Tanizaki
item.description: "There are those who hold that to quibble over matters of taste in the basic necessities of life is an extravagance" -- Jun'ichirō Tanizaki

item.title: Dav add a quote by Jun'ichirō Tanizaki
item.description: "There are those who say that when civilization progresses a bit further transportation facilities will move into the skies and under the ground, and that our streets will again be quiet, but I know perfectly well that when that day comes some new device for torturing the old will be invented." -- Jun'ichirō Tanizaki
